This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Simple substitution test
  assert_equals: Expected Value should match actual value expected "20px" but got "20px 20px"
[FAIL] You can't build up a single token where part of it is provided by a variable
  assert_equals: Expected Value should match actual value expected "0px" but got "0px 0px"
[FAIL] Fallback value
  assert_equals: Expected Value should match actual value expected "11px" but got "11px 11px"
[FAIL] Fallback value which is also a variable reference
  assert_equals: Expected Value should match actual value expected "27px" but got "27px 27px"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
